headline: Molson Coors books hefty impairment charges, Q3 sales down
summary: The US giant recorded impairments on its Americas unit and on two other sets of assets.

raw.headline: Molson Coors books hefty impairment charges, Q3 sales down
raw.summary: The US giant recorded impairments on its Americas unit and on two other sets of assets.

headline: Molson Coors Brewing (TAP) Q3 Earnings and Revenues Lag Estimates
summary: Molson Coors (TAP) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -2.91% and -1.67%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Molson Coors Brewing (TAP) Q3 Earnings and Revenues Lag Estimates
raw.summary: Molson Coors (TAP) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -2.91% and -1.67%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Molson Coors Expects to Hit Low End of Outlook After Sales Fall
summary: Molson Coors swung to a loss and logged lower sales in the third quarter, as the beer industry contends with a widespread slump.

raw.headline: Molson Coors Expects to Hit Low End of Outlook After Sales Fall
raw.summary: Molson Coors swung to a loss and logged lower sales in the third quarter, as the beer industry contends with a widespread slump.

headline: Molson Coors (NYSE:TAP) Misses Q3 Revenue Estimates
summary: Beer company Molson Coors (NYSE:TAP) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales falling 2.3% year on year to $2.97 billion. Its GAAP loss of $14.79 per share decreased from $0.96 in the same quarter last year.

raw.headline: Molson Coors (NYSE:TAP) Misses Q3 Revenue Estimates
